title: Gwen Stefani | FBI Seized Nuclear Docs Stolen by Trump at Mar-a-Lago, GOP Hypocrites Shrug: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Donald Trump apparently stashing highly classified documents about the nuclear capabilities of a foreign nation at Mar-a-Lago and reportedly bragging to friends that he had intelligence about the French president’s sex life.

Then, Gwen Stefani talks about touring with her husband Blake Shelton, auditioning to be a cheerleader in high school and pretending to play the piccolo in marching band.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
